title: One Piece Diaries #72 - One Piece x Toriko Collaboration Special
author: Unknown
description: A blog review of the One Piece x Toriko crossover special episodes, including Episode 542. The reviewer notes that the crossover interrupted the Fisher Tiger flashback story and concludes that unless viewers are charmed by the unusual foods in the Toriko world, they do not recommend watching this crossover.

title: One Piece Episode 542 - Toriko x One Piece Crossover 2
author: Tazangetsu Shinji Anime
description: A blog post from April 2012 about Episode 542, posted shortly after the episode aired. The post primarily provided download links for the episode.

title: Crunchyroll Adds 2 One Piece x Toriko Crossover Specials
author: Anime News Network
description: News article announcing that Crunchyroll added the two One Piece x Toriko crossover specials (Episodes 492 and 542) to their streaming service, marking the first time these episodes became legally available for streaming in English.

title: 542: One Piece x Toriko Crossover #2
author: Arlong Park Forums Community
description: Fan forum discussion thread about Episode 542. Users discussed the episode's animation quality (with some criticizing it as having 'worst One Piece animation ever at times'), the plot structure, and debated the merits of the Toriko series. The discussion includes both criticism and defense of the crossover episode.

title: Episode 542, 'Swordsicles!'
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: The One Piece Podcast's 542nd episode (Note: This is the podcast's episode number, not a discussion of anime episode 542. This podcast episode actually covers One Piece Chapter 921 'Shutenmaru' with special guests from Funimation).

title: MAYBE ITS FRIENDLY!!! (Episode 542)
author: @nanbaka33
description: A TikTok video featuring a humorous reaction to Episode 542, specifically referencing a giant mushroom scene with tags including #onepiece #toriko #crossover #animecrossover #funny #giantmushroom #avatarthelastairbender #atla #sokka #cactusjuice
